event.executesql: create unique nonclustered index ix_pc_ac_b_1_A on pc_account_balances_1_A ( account_id, account_type )
create unique nonclustered index ix_pc_ac_b_1_B on pc_account_balances_1_B ( account_id, account_type )
create unique nonclustered index ix_pc_ac_b_2_A on pc_account_balances_2_A ( account_id, account_type )
create unique nonclustered index ix_pc_ac_b_2_B on pc_account_balances_2_B ( account_id, account_type )
